data.title: POEditor localization platform
data.meta_description: See here what each language abbreviation means in POEditor's language list.
data.text:
POEditor's language menu contains some language that are abbreviated. Here's a list of them and what they stand for.

Arabic (DZ) - Arabic Algeria

Arabic (BH) - Arabic Bahrain

Arabic (EG) - Arabic Egypt

Arabic (IQ) - Arabic Iraq

Arabic (JO) - Arabic Jordan

Arabic (KW) - Arabic Kuwait

Arabic (LB) - Arabic Lebanon

Arabic (LY) - Arabic Libya

Arabic (MA) - Arabic Morocco

Arabic (OM) - Arabic Oman

Arabic (QA) - Arabic Qatar

Arabic (SA) - Arabic Saudi Arabia

Arabic (SY) - Arabic Syria

Arabic (TN) - Arabic Tunisia

Arabic (AE) - Arabic United Arab Emirates

Arabic (YE) - Arabic Yemen

Chinese (HK) - Cantonese

Chinese (SG) - Singaporean Mandarin

Chinese (MO) - Chinese Macau SAR

Chinese (TW) - Chinese Taiwan

English (AU) - Australian English

English (BZ) - English Belize

English (CA) - Canadian English

English (GH) - English Ghana

English (HK) - Hong-Kong English

English (IN) - Indian English

English (IE) - Irish English

English (JM) - Jamaican English

English (KE) - English Kenya

English (MU) - Mauritius English

English (NG) - English Nigeria

English (NZ) - New Zealand English

English (PH) - English Philippines

English (SG) - Singapore English

English (TT) - English Trinidad and Tobago

English (US) - American English

English (ZA) - South African English

English (ZW) - English Zimbabwe

French (BE) - Belgian French

French (CA) - Canadian French

French (CH) - Swiss French

French (LU) - French Luxembourg

French (MC) - French Morocco

German (AT) - Austrian German

German (BE) - Belgian German

German (CH) - Swiss German

German (LI) - German Liechtenstein

German (LU) - German Luxembourg

Italian (CH) - Swiss Italian

Malay (BN) - Malay Brunei

Portuguese (BR) - Brazilian Portuguese

Spanish (AR) - Argentinian Spanish

Spanish (BO) - Bolivian Spanish

Spanish (CL) - Chilean Spanish

Spanish (CR) - Spanish Costa Rica

Spanish (CO) - Colombian Spanish

Spanish (DO) - Dominican Spanish

Spanish (EC) - Spanish Ecuador

Spanish (GT) - Guatemalan Spanish

Spanish (LA & C) - Spanish Latin America and the Caribbean region

Spanish (MX) - Spanish Mexico

Spanish (NI) - Spanish Nicaragua

Spanish (PA) - Spanish Panama

Spanish (PE) - Spanish Peru

Spanish (PR) - Spanish Puerto Rico

Spanish (PY) - Spanish Paraguay

Spanish (UY) - Spanish Uruguay

Spanish (VE) - Spanish Venezuela

Spanish (SV) - Spanish El Salvador

Swedish (FI) - Swedish Finland
